foreignData.name: Iwamori von der Offenfaust
foreignData.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Wenn Iwamori von der Offenfaust ins Spiel kommt, kann jeder Gegner eine legendäre Kreaturenkarte aus seiner Hand ins Spiel bringen.

foreignData.name: Iwamori del puño abierto
foreignData.text:
Arrolla.
Cuando Iwamori del puño abierto entra en juego, cada oponente puede poner en juego una carta de criatura legendaria de su mano.

foreignData.name: Iwamori du poing ouvert
foreignData.text:
Piétinement
Quand Iwamori du poing ouvert arrive en jeu, chaque adversaire peut mettre en jeu une carte de créature légendaire de sa main.

foreignData.name: Iwamori della Mano Aperta
foreignData.text:
Travolgere
Quando Iwamori della Mano Aperta entra in gioco, ogni avversario può mettere in gioco una carta creatura leggendaria dalla propria mano.

foreignData.name: 素拳の岩守
foreignData.text:
トランプル
素拳の岩守が場に出たとき、各対戦相手は自分の手札にある伝説のクリーチャー・カードを１枚場に出してもよい。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・モンク

foreignData.name: Iwamori dos Punhos Abertos
foreignData.text:
Atropelar
Quando Iwamori dos Punhos Abertos entra em jogo, cada oponente pode colocar em jogo um card de criatura lendária de sua mão.

foreignData.name: 论拳岩守
foreignData.text:
践踏
当论拳岩守进场时，每位对手可以将其手上一张传奇生物牌放置进场。

name: Iwamori of the Open Fist
originalText:
Trample
When Iwamori of the Open Fist comes into play, each opponent may put a legendary creature card from his or her hand into play.

rulings.text: When Iwamori’s triggered ability resolves, first the player whose turn it is (if that player is an opponent) may choose a legendary creature card in hand without revealing it, then each other opponent in turn order may do the same, then all chosen cards are put onto the battlefield at the same time.

text:
Trample
When Iwamori of the Open Fist enters the battlefield, each opponent may put a legendary creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.
